post.body: u guys are just too much fun not to be in contact with!! thank YOU x
well then, I have 1 fan that likes 2 things - that's motivation enuff 4 me! cheers x
haha.. the robin antin of twitter hey - in a burlesque sense or just talented in every way?? LOL thanks , i think!
I've always wanted a man to say that to me (in the hopes that that man was actually George Clooney *drool*)
haha... because it's all about the view! :P (i'm sure you're talking about my blog and not my booty!! lol)
@kingjac aw, you guys are so sweet! thanks :)
was that dim sum? as in the deep fried chickent feet?? I am jealous... trade you an italian meatball 4 some dim sum? lol
Your sweet potato coffee cake looks so goooood! i wish my over worked cos I wanna try it!
haha... live twitter feeds in your sleep.. now wouldnt that be wonderful??
I would be stoked with diamonds! A day spa package never goes astray either :) let us know how u go!
the cancer one with a space for letters to mum... (clearly that is my sign!)
you're only warmer than me cos its summer time over there! haha
house sitting... now there is an idea for free travel accom :)
I wasn't going to make any 'skank' comments without the evidence - and i dont smell poo! haha... your a classic
sure do, and a few of the ppl i follow as well! haha, might be the xmas blues tho! or wet socks from the floodings in Venice
I'd be flattered with that!
it's always time to dance.. in my head, the music never stops!
haha... fussy Italian kids! dammit :(
oh he hears us.. & he cries everytime we lie- well thats what my mum told me lol
the sun was out today! absolutely gorgeous- acqua alta is all over for now!
its gotta be American - Italy is like so far behind the rest of the world its not funny! fashion forward, life is backwards! lol
thanks so much for stopping in! glad u enjoyed it http://nikkitaly.blogspot.com
mmm.. good chocolate is easy to find- it must be reaaaaally good chocolate!
aw, at least u get a 'white xmas' with free delivery, that story was a cracker! cheers
Let's hope so!! haha... ciao bella - let u know how i go later x
ooooh, my dirty 30! thanks babe!
the pleasure is all mine :) you're welcome!
been a whole new experience for me! I'm a red dirt kinda gal :P u can see pics from floods on my blog! http://bit.ly/GeJc
why is it that tweeting always makes me hungry? You guys talk about food too much! haha
eating crunchy peanut butter off the spoon... mmmm
My Twitemperature is a cold (6Â°C)! http://twitemperature.com/nikkiitaly
is on Xmas dessert duties... needs an idea - MUST BE CHOCOLATE!
has been enjoying some very pretty moments in Venice - photos here http://bit.ly/17kce
is too full of popcorn and pancakes! Fun day at the waterside carnival in Venice!
saw a pretty wedding in Venice today - wants to investigate this further!
is on her way out the door.. the sun is (kinda) shining and I want to explore!!! Hopefully come back with something interesting *wink*
Enjoying the Mixed Traditions of Xmas at home - didn't realise I was this good a cook! http://nikkitaly.blogspot.com/
